extension.name: Phone Number Validator
extension.description: The popular UK Phone Number Validator has been rewritten to support multiple countries' phone systems and common formatting options. If your country's phone system is missing, please submit an issue on GitHub so that I can add it.
extension.comments: The old UK Phone Number Validator can be found at https://github.com/JohnFF/UK-Phone-Number-Validator. It is considered deprecated. It is also thought of as being v1.0 of this extension.
